purpleculture_pinyin:
lǒng
to gather together; to collect; to approach; to draw near to; to add; to sum up; to comb (hair)
собираться вместе; собирать; приближаться; приблизиться к; добавить; подводить итоги; расчесывать (волосы)

humanum_full_description_en:
From " hand " to " dragon " sound. The original meaning is to gather and consolidate. Such as "Selected Works. Guo Jingchun's "Jiang Fu": "Yu Jing began in Luolai, Wanchuan and Baliang." Li Shan's note: "Close, still include Shuye." Tang Dynasty Bai Juyi "Fuxi Ting Na Lianggui": "Bandan shirt After dismissing, Ma Wenren drew bridle.

The extension of " close " refers to sorting and sorting. "Ji Yun. "Eastern Rhyme": "Let's make sense." For example, Han Hao of the Tang Dynasty "The Twelve Rhymes of Spring Sorrowful Occasion": "Intentionally sympathetic, silently close to the temple." Northern Song Dynasty Ouyang Xiu "Butterfly Flower": "Baozhuo coral mountain is thin , The updo is gently gathered, a cloud grows sleeves."

" Rope " means close, closer. For example, Ding Xianzhi in the Tang Dynasty "Jiangnan Song": "You know the old meaning of the man, and please keep the bow of the ship." "Journey to the West" Chapter 27: "The fairy must take him when he comes forward. I saw that there were two generals on the left and right of the elder. Dare to get together."

" Toggle " also refers to the action of stroking strings, which is a fingering method for playing a stringed instrument. For example, Li Shen of the Tang Dynasty: "Bearing the golden phoenix as the undertaking, turn your wrists and draw strings to promote the wipe." Huang Tingjian of the Northern Song Dynasty "Remembering the Emperor." Free pipa prostitute>: "Twist slowly and gently, just like whispers."
humanum_short_description_en: From the " hand " to the sound of " dragon ". The original meaning is to gather and consolidate.
humanum_full_description:
從「手」，「龍」聲。本義是聚集、收束。如《文選．郭景純〈江賦〉》：「聿經始於洛沬，攏萬川乎巴梁。」李善注：「攏，猶括束也。」唐代白居易〈府西亭納涼歸〉：「帶寬衫解領，馬穩人攏轡。」

　　「攏」引申指梳理、整理。《集韻．東韻》：「攏，理也。」如唐代韓偓〈春悶偶成十二韻〉：「有意通情處，無言攏鬢時。」北宋歐陽修〈蝶戀花〉：「寶琢珊瑚山樣瘦，緩髻輕攏，一朵雲生袖。」

　　「攏」表示靠近、靠攏。如唐代丁仙芝〈江南曲〉：「知郎舊時意，且請攏船頭。」《西遊記》第27回：「那妖精上前就要拿他，只見長老左右手下有兩員大將護持，不敢攏身。」

　　「攏」亦指撫弦的動作，是一種彈奏弦樂器的指法。如唐代李紳〈悲善才〉：「銜花金鳳當承撥，轉腕攏弦促揮抹。」北宋黃庭堅〈憶帝京．贈彈琵琶妓〉：「慢捻復輕攏，切切如私語。」
humanum_short_description: 從「手」，「龍」聲。本義是聚集、收束。

Chinese: Your fingers start to tremble as you draw near the dragon cave.
Meaning: draw near
Hanzi: 拢
Story: Your fingers start to tremble as you draw near the dragon cave.
Kind: traditional
從「 手 」，「 龍 」聲。本義是聚集、收束。如《文選．郭景純〈江賦〉》：「聿經始於洛沬，攏萬川乎巴梁。」李善注：「攏，猶括束也。」唐代白居易〈府西亭納涼歸〉：「帶寬衫解領，馬穩人攏轡。」 「 攏 」引申指梳理、整理。《集韻．東韻》：「攏，理也。」如唐代韓偓〈春悶偶成十二韻〉：「有意通情處，無言攏鬢時。」北宋歐陽修〈蝶戀花〉：「寶琢珊瑚山樣瘦，緩髻輕攏，一朵雲生袖。」 「 攏 」表示靠近、靠攏。如唐代丁仙芝〈江南曲〉：「知郎舊時意，且請攏船頭。」《西遊記》第27回：「那妖精上前就要拿他，只見長老左右手下有兩員大將護持，不敢攏身。」 「 攏 」亦指撫弦的動作，是一種彈奏弦樂器的指法。如唐代李紳〈悲善才〉：「銜花金鳳當承撥，轉腕攏弦促揮抹。」北宋黃庭堅〈憶帝京．贈彈琵琶妓〉：「慢捻復輕攏，切切如私語。」
